alert: 🚨 CRITICAL: Unauthorized person detected inside Academic Library. Potential forced entry in progress.
recommended_action: Immediately dispatch security personnel to the Academic Library (camera ID: CAM_LIBRARY). Locate and identify the unauthorized individual. Proceed with caution, as audio indicates a potential forced entry attempt ('door_rattling').
explanation: Priority is CRITICAL due to a confirmed unauthorized individual inside a sensitive building, coupled with an audio anomaly suggesting an active attempt to breach an internal door. This poses an immediate risk of theft, vandalism, or unauthorized access to restricted areas.
risk_factors: Audio evidence of potential forced entry (door rattling)

source_event.description: Detected: 1 person. 1 unauthorized person(s). in Academic Library. Risk factors: Unknown person detected
